name: Agriculture Exhibition Award Medal
obverse: A horse stands behind a cow which is laying on the ground. To the right is a plow and a beehive on a table. To the left in the background is a barn and a smoke stack. To the right in the background is a forest.
reverse: A wreath enclosing an inscription in 4 lines.
description: This medal was made to be presented to winners of agricultural exhibitions. This particular medal is inscribed on the edge with 'MJV BRONS 1954'.
